code: var useBmi=function useBmi(_ref){var weight=_ref.weight,height=_ref.height;var weightKgNum=Number(weight);var heightMeterNum=Number(height)/100;var bmiVal=weightKgNum/Math.pow(heightMeterNum,2)||0;var status='';var color='';if(bmiVal<18.5){status='underweight';color='yellow';}else if(bmiVal<25.0){status='normal';color='green';}else if(bmiVal<30.0){status='overweight';color='pink';}else{status='obesity';color='red';}return{score:bmiVal.toFixed(2),status:status,color:color};};export default useBmi;
